description: Discover 365 Bible Verses on the topic of love. This "verse a day" app will deliver God's word inspiring your love for Him and for others.  People from all over the world enjoy different translations and versions of the Bible. Therefore Daily Light lets you choose from several of the most popular Bible versions so that the message of the day will appear in a format you're comfortable with. Popular versions include New International Version (NIV), King James Version (KJV), New King James Version (NKJV), Amplified Bible (AMP), New American Standard Bible (NASB), American Standard Version (ASV) and many others. If you want to ensure that your day starts off right, use the reminder feature to set the time you'd like to see your daily message of love each day. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to send us a message at support@ttpsoft.com.  Also consider adding a rating, so that others will know if you found this app useful. Thanks!
